The Next Generation of Task Planning
Optimize your task management with personalized insights and streamlined tracking.

Why TaskFlow?

TaskFlow is a powerful tool designed to streamline your task management and boost productivity. Whether you're managing a team or tracking personal projects, TaskFlow adapts to your unique workflow, ensuring that you stay organized and focused on what truly matters.

Say goodbye to chaos and hello to clarity with TaskFlow.

Take a glimpse on the app flow

See the power of AI as it personalizes your path and uncovers new opportunities. Don't miss out on this transformative experience.

THE APP

How it Works

Registration

Get started by creating your Xpecies account. It's quick,easy.

Self-Assessment

Dive into Xpecies revolutionary self-assessment tool, to uncover your strengths, passions, and aspirations. Brace yourself for a journey of self-discovery that will shape your future.

Personalized Path

Starting with your self-assessment, Xpecies presents you with personalised path possibilities. Gain insights and receive educational and professional advice tailored to your unique profile.

Challenge Area

Ready to put your skills to the test? Take on challenges that validate and enhance your abilities. As you conquer new challenges, Xpecies algorithm fine-tunes your path advice, ensuring precision and accuracy.

Future Of Work

Stay ahead of the curve by diving into the future of work. Use Xpecies AI-powered in-app tool to explore the latest news, trends, and insights to future-proof your career.

Initial People Offer (IPO)

When you feel ready to take the next big step, head to the IPO section. Launch yourself to the world, showcasing your skills and unique value proposition.

THE STORY

Know Our Origins

Xpecies is a new startup but already comes with lots of experience.

The founders bring more than 20 years of experience with clients such as Nestl, Swiss Re and Natura, assessing skills and shaping career and educational paths.

Xpecies revolutionises career advising and education, empowering individuals with boundless possibilities for professional longevity.

"The Digital Academy had a significant impact on our operation. Tamboro's expertise in educational technology and gamification helped us transform our technical knowledge into effective digital content. The tool's acceptance was excellent, with over 10,000 completed training courses and certificates issued. Measurement tools like NPS and learning quality algorithms validated user satisfaction and return on investment."

Executive Vice President Brazil and Head of LATAM Distribution

Swiss Re Corporate Solutions
